name: HH_PBLST_INFO
description: Contains Home Health problem list noadd single items information.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the problem list.

columns.name: WOUND_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Wound location.  Links to category table ZC_WOUND_LOCATION.

columns.name: WOUND_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Wound type.  Links to category table ZC_WOUND_TYPE.

columns.name: WOUND_IS_ACTIVE_YN
columns.description: Is the wound active?  Yes or no.

columns.name: WOUND_IS_DELETE_YN
columns.description: Has the wound been deleted?  Yes or no.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Wound deletion contact serial number.  A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.  Links to table PAT_ENC.
